Activity.description: Contains information about the activity that was performed.

activity_id.description: A unique identifier for the activity.

activity_type.description: A human-readable reference to the type of activity, preferably using an identifier in a recommended standard ontology.

activity_type_code.description: Code associated with the activity type concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

activity_type_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

data_modality.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

generated_biosample_id.description: A reference to the sample generated by this activity.

generated_file_id.description: Associated file ID that links to the record in the file table representing the file generated by this activity.

used_biosample_id.description: A reference to the sample used by this activity.

used_file_id.description: Associated file ID that links to the record in the file table representing the file used in this activity.

Activity.title: Activity

BioSample.description: Contains information about the sample(s) included in the study.

anatomical_site.description: A human-readable reference to the site within the organism from which the biosample was taken.

anatomical_site_code.description: Code associated with the anatomical site concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

anatomical_site_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

apriori_cell_type.description: A human-readable reference to the a priori cell type(s) for the sample, a human assignment of cell type without experimental data.

apriori_cell_type_code.description: Code associated with the a priori cell type concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

apriori_cell_type_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

biosample_id.description: A unique identifier for the biosample.

biosample_type.description: A human-readable reference to the type of biosample represented by the record.

biosample_type_code.description: Code associated with the biosample type concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

biosample_type_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

donor_age_at_collection_lower_bound.description: Lower bound for age of donor at time sample was taken. If any age at collection data is present, must specify a unit as well.

donor_age_at_collection_unit.description: The units (e.g. years or days) of the Age of the Donor at the point in time that the BioSample was obtained or other representative entity (test, diagnosis, treatment...) was created.

donor_age_at_collection_upper_bound.description: Upper bound for age of donor at time sample was taken. If any age at collection data is present, must specify a unit as well.

donor_id_fk.description: This property references the Donor organism from which the BioSample was acquired.

primary_condition.description: A human-readable property that identifies a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

primary_condition_code.description: Code associated with the disease concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

primary_condition_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

BioSample.title: BioSample

Condition.description: Contains information about the condition(s) of the donor.

condition.description: A human-readable property that describes a disease, condition, or phenotype that has been reported in this entity in a human readable manner (as opposed to a code/id/etc). If multiple values exist, they must be synonymous.

condition_code.description: Code associated with the condition concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field. If multiple values exist, they must be synonymous.

condition_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

condition_id.description: A unique identifier for the documented condition - internal identifier.

donor_id_fk.description: This property references the Donor organism from which the BioSample was acquired.

donor_is_affected.description: A Boolean value representing whether a subject is affected by a documented condition or not. Allows documentation of pertinent negatives. If empty, defaults to true.

observation_age_lower_bound.description: Earliest age a patient was diagnosed or identified as having a condition/phenotype. If providing an exact age, lower and upper bounds should be the same value.

observation_age_unit.description: A reference to the unit of time used to represent age.

observation_age_upper_bound.description: Latest age a patient was diagnosed or identified as having a condition/phenotype. If providing an exact age, lower and upper bounds should be the same value.

onset_age_lower_bound.description: Earliest age for condition onset. If providing an exact age, lower and upper bounds should be the same value.

onset_age_unit.description: A reference to the unit of time used to represent age.

onset_age_upper_bound.description: Latest age for condition onset. If providing an exact age, lower and upper bounds should be the same value.

Condition.title: Condition

Donor.description: Demographic and phenotypic information about the donor.

donor_id.description: A unique identifier for the donor.

donor_type.description: Type of donor represented by the record. If blank, the data will be treated as Patient by default.

genetic_acestry_code.description: Code associated with the genetic ancestry concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

genetic_ancestry.description: A human-readable property that reflects a donor's reported major contributing ancestral origins based on genetic/genomic data.

genetic_ancestry_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

organism_type.description: A human-readable reference to the organism type.

organism_type_code.description: Code associated with the organism type concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

organism_type_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

phenotypic_sex.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex of the Donor organism. \"An organismal quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical expression of sexual characteristics. [PATO_0001894]\

phenotypic_sex_code.description: Code associated with the biological sex concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

phenotypic_sex_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

reported_ethnicity.description: A property that relects a Human Donor's reported ethnic origins. Note this may contain both Race and Ethnicity information as define by the US Department of Interior (DOI) https://www.doi.gov/pmb/eeo/directives/race-data

reported_ethnicity_code.description: Code associated with the reported ethnicity concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

reported_ethnicity_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

Donor.title: Donor

Donor__identifier_optional.description: Demographic and phenotypic information about the donor.

donor_id.description: A unique identifier for the donor.

donor_type.description: Type of donor represented by the record. If blank, the data will be treated as Patient by default.

genetic_acestry_code.description: Code associated with the genetic ancestry concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

genetic_ancestry.description: A human-readable property that reflects a donor's reported major contributing ancestral origins based on genetic/genomic data.

genetic_ancestry_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

organism_type.description: A human-readable reference to the organism type.

organism_type_code.description: Code associated with the organism type concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

organism_type_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

phenotypic_sex.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex of the Donor organism. \"An organismal quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical expression of sexual characteristics. [PATO_0001894]\

phenotypic_sex_code.description: Code associated with the biological sex concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

phenotypic_sex_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

reported_ethnicity.description: A property that relects a Human Donor's reported ethnic origins. Note this may contain both Race and Ethnicity information as define by the US Department of Interior (DOI) https://www.doi.gov/pmb/eeo/directives/race-data

reported_ethnicity_code.description: Code associated with the reported ethnicity concept in a coding system; system and label are specified in a separate field.

reported_ethnicity_coding_system.description: Reference (URL, etc) to the system that the code and title came from.

Donor__identifier_optional.title: Donor

File.description: Information for files associated with the study.

biosample_id_fk.description: The BioSample ID representing the biosample that was used to generate the file.

data_modality.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

file_format.description: An indication of the format of an electronic file; include the full file extension including compression extensions. Usually aligns with file extension (e.g. bam, sam, text, csv, etc.)

file_id.description: A unique identifier for the file.

file_ref.description: The fully qualified path to the file.

reference_assembly.description: A reference to the collection of sequences taken as the standard for a given organism. May be defined by https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/grc.

File.title: File

funded_by.description: A relationship defining the funding source.  The range is expected to include grants, organizations, or a string indicating the funding source.

principal_investigator.description: A relationship defining the principal investigator.  The range is expected to include a person or a string indicating the principal investigator.

project_id.description: A unique identifier for the project.

registered_identifier.description: Registered identifier for the project, such as the dbGaP PHS ID.
